Event.Message: Attempt to use MFT clsid %1 marked as do not use.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="clsid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Attempt to use Media Source clsid %1 marked as do not use.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="clsid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Mark MFT clsid %1 do not use = %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="clsid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Disabled" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: Mark Media Source clsid %1 do not use = %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="clsid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Disabled" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: Choosing preferred MFT clsid %1 for subtype %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="clsid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Selector" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Registering preferred MFT clsid %1 for subtype %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="clsid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Selector" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Choosing preferred Media Source clsid %1 for %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="clsid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Selector" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Registering preferred Media Soure clsid %1 for %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="clsid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Selector" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Found preferred MFT clsid %1 for media subtype %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="clsid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Selector" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Did not find preferred MFT for media subtype %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Selector" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Query MFT clsid %1 do not use: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="clsid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Disabled" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: Found preferred Media Source clsid %1 for %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="clsid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Selector" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Did not find preferred Media Source for %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Selector" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Query Media Source clsid %1 do not use: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="clsid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Disabled" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>
<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MFTName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MFTName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Category" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="LinkName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="FriendlyName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Category" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="dwType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="dwConfig" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="hr" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="hr" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Source Resolver Context(%1) Trying Scheme Handler %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Context" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="clsid" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Source Resolver Context(%1) Trying Byte Scheme Handler CLSID(%2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Context" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="clsid" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Source Resolver Context(%1) Byte stream Handler Result %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Context" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="hr" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Context" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="url" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="hr" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="stream" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="offset" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="length" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="buffer" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="stream" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="length" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="buffer" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="hr" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: MFTEnumEx flags %1, category %2 for input type (%3,%4), output type (%5,%6)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Category" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="inputType" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="inputSubtype" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="outputType" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="outputSubtype" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>
<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="clsid" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="string" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="string" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: MFTEnumEx returned code %1, found %2 local MFTs, %3 hardware MFTs and %4 MFT CLSIDs
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="hr" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="localMFTs" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="hardwareMFTs" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MFTs" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: MFTEnum2 flags %1, category %2 for input type (%3,%4), output type (%5,%6), LUID set: %7
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Category" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="inputType" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="inputSubtype" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="outputType" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="outputSubtype" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="luidSet" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: MFTEnum2 returned code %1, found %2 MFTs matching adapter with vendor ID %3, device ID %4, SubSys ID %5, Revision %6
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="hr" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="numMFTs" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="adapterVendorId" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="adapterDeviceId" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="adapterSubSysId" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="adapterRevision" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>
<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>
